name: Schatte ～The Witch and the Fake Shadow～ / 魔女と偽りの影
description: This is an all-new 3D shadow-stepping action game featuring a comical duo: Schatte the shadow witch and Lumiere the fairy lantern bat. Use your servant Lumiere to expose enemy shadows so that Schatte could overcome them with her shadow magic.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: 10 Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system Storage: 2 GB available space
